website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, stylish, and adjustable double-leg bicycle kickstand that is sure to serve you well.
pros: Expertly crafted from high-end aluminum, ensuring the kickstand is built to last
Features a bottom bracket that makes the kickstand easy to install on most bikes
Silver kickstand will maintain its appearance for an extended period of time
cons: May be tough to tighten the screw that connects the kickstand to bicycle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kickstand even though it didn't suit my needs
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, sturdy, and adjustable. The mechanism is smooth and crisp. Do note that this kickstand can only be mounted with a bolt from above, intended to be used in the triangular space between the chainstays of a standard bicycle. It's not visible in the photos here, but the threaded hole does not go all the way through the body of the kickstand, and so it cannot be mounted with a bolt from below into a threaded hole in a solid surface, as in some specialty bikes such as the Strida line. If that's what you need, Soma makes a (somewhat more expensive and boxy) stand that is similar in function with a hole that goes through the body.
customer_reviews.author: Russell E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works well...
customer_reviews.text: Like it! I have a very tall hybrid bike (23” frame) that was too top heavy for the standard type kickstand.. the slightest wind would knock it down (front and rear baskets didn't exactly help either!). This two legged stand is much better! I only wish that the spread of the legs was even wider.. but, none the less, i am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cusack

customer_reviews.title: Practical elegance
customer_reviews.text: This version of a twin leg stand is a classy way to support my bike. Steady enough to allow sister to load groceries or dog in basket, strong enough to support the ebike conversion. Smooth operation, solid lock in place, and really looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kneelzsteex

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT but couldn't use for my bike
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. My boyfriend found it and suggested it for my bike that we've been tricking out. After installing the Bafang and the other doohickeys, unfortunately, it interfered with the kickstand being able to come out fully. I was so disappointed but thankfully it works on my boyfriend's bike. Both our bikes are heavy and this wonderful innovation is perfect for keeping the bike extremely stable. Please make sure that you take the correct measurements after installing what you need to on your bike to make sure that the kickstand can come out properly.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only complaint is that the hex bolt that holds it to the bike has come loose twice. I added locktite the last time it came loose and so far it's holding.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: A fan of VO parts but not so much of this kick stand
customer_reviews.text: The drive side leg of the stand is not sturdy. My bike can he ripped over on the drive side with panniers loaded. The only remedy I have found is to extend the drivetrain side leg so now the bike tilts to the other side but at least it's not tipping over anymore. Should have gone with VO's other centerstand offering. This type just seems gimmicky.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: This is what every kickstand on every bike this 56-year-old has ever had should have been.
customer_reviews.text: This thing stands your bike straight up. The bike is supported regardless of the position of the front wheel, regardless of the degree of incline and virtually regardless of how much gear you're carrying. Its ingenious design collapses both legs over to the non-drive side of the bike. It deploys and retracts with the ease of an ordinary kickstand. It's a little chunky but not to the point of being an issue. It's a little heavier than an average kickstand but I don't care. Whomever designed this thing deserves a hug.
customer_reviews.author: Bob_in_RI

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Easy to Adjust
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I love this kickstand! Using it on a fairly heavy cruiser bicycle that was converted into an eBike. This stands up in wind and holds steady when weighed down with rear panniers. Has several heights to adjust to fit multiple bike sizes. Exactly what I needed to keep a bike on the heavy side standing upright.
customer_reviews.author: synacktik

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Just completed by first 250 miles with this kickstand. Just as I hoped, it provides more security than a single kickstand when the bike is loaded up with paniers. I did some testing and found that adjusting the two sides to slightly different lengths helped increase stability.
customer_reviews.author: Darkwing Duck

customer_reviews.title: strong kickstand for touring bike
customer_reviews.text: replaced single kickstand on my Trek 520 with this double kickstand to support the loaded touring bike. Very durable and quality made. The Amazon Order was fulfilled quickly (a day early) without any issues. Install took about 30mins, due to adjusting with the fenders on the rear tire. added some paint protection and loctite on the threads of the bolt. For the 520, used the longer of the two provided bolts. slight adjustment / alignment with the rear chainstay so it would not interfere with pedaling. Highly recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. Belaska

customer_reviews.title: It's a kickstand alright
customer_reviews.text: Its a great kickstand if you have a basket on your bike, mine stopped falling over while loading it up. Easy install an seems to be good quality, if it holds up for a few years it'll be worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Clever design, folded gets completely out of the way
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase - sturdy, adjustable heights, easy to deploy and fold. Chain maintenance is now a breeze. I just wish plastic extension legs were metal to longevity, but with accurate use the plastic should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Enough
customer_reviews.text: Wish the legs were a little more spread out and a little more stable, but it's been working fine as is. Easy to install and good stability given the weight and size.
customer_reviews.author: No Body

customer_reviews.title: Nice double legged kickstand.
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to go for real touring bikes. The bike stands upright on the two legs.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Kunich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I never knew something like this existed. This kickstand takes my rear wheel off the ground. Then it all folds to the left side. It is solid, quality excellence. If you want the best kickstand; then you need to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, 2nd one I have bought. Prompt delivery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Sherburn

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Love this kickstand. It’s tucked in nicely when not in use, it’s quiet, and it does a great job keeping the bike upright and stable when in use. Install is super simple too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not rugged enough
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my SO MTB with a baby seat at the back. Worked for the first Cycling trip we had but it sort of stopped being able to be kicked up and we kept needing to use our hands just to pull it up together so it will go up. Also, not a good idea to leave the child in the seat with this stand on as any movement from the child can tip it over!
customer_reviews.author: Dzul Ezwan

customer_reviews.title: no instructions!
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions in the box and none can be found online either. I like the stand, but I just spent an hour trying to search online for any double kickstand installation information. Im mainly trying to figure out proper length and installation guides for bikes without the attachment plate.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It will fall apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: The rubber leg fell off of it after just a few uses!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Baker III

customer_reviews.title: Could be more stable
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sharp on my classic touring bike but it is not the super-study stand I had hoped. I have to be very careful loading panniers and keeping balanced. It's about the same as a regular single side kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: tbone

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Could be more stable. Like being able to adjust length for my long recumbent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It is stable and upright plumb.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kick stand for parking a bicycle at stores without a bicycle rack or on flat surface where there is not a pole or tree to tie it to. It is worth the extra weight for a commuter bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kick stand
customer_reviews.text: Much more stable than the stand that came with the bike! Easy to install, and easy to adjust the height to fit the bike.
customer_reviews.author: KMR

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy, holds up my 75 lbs Ebike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, holds my 75 lbs ebike upright, even on hills, folds up and out of the way easily, easy to install. The mechanism gets gritty if dirt gets in, so remember to hose it out and perhaps regrease it every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Ottey

customer_reviews.title: Well built, and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well built. A stylish and sturdy addition to your bike. Makes quick repairs a breeze and sturdy enough to keep your loaded down bike upright. The wheel stabilizer by Velo, Orange is an excellent additional purchase
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I have a large 32 in Kent and this kickstand is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Jones

customer_reviews.title: did not work for my setup.
customer_reviews.text: its nicely build, just didnt work out for my bike. velo orange quality, durability and reliability is on point, just not for my bike setup :( velo orange always delivers. i have a awkward setup, ill have to stick my chain stay kick stand for the time.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Stand out
customer_reviews.text: I really like it... I was thinking it would be to short initially..but after adjustments it’s really nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allglad

product_meta.title: Vélo Orange Copenhagen Béquille double
product_meta.description:
